articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: The ultra rich want to live forever and are shelling out big bucks to do so. But biohacking is starting to seep into the mainstream.
articles.title: The Rich Are Splurging on Biohacking Clubs to Cheat Death

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The sMiles app's new location-based "Bitcoinverse" game offers another way to earn Bitcoin rewards beyond racking up steps and shopping.
articles.title: You Can Earn Bitcoin for Walking Around Major Cities—Here's How

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: More than 2,000 BTC are on the move after years of inactivity.
articles.title: Bitcoin Whales Moved Nearly $60 Million In Five Days

articles.author: Nicholas Morgan
articles.description: The exchange, which began trading last month, seeks to bring more liquidity to market for its clients.
articles.title: EDX Markets Crypto Exchange Taps Talos to Broaden Reach

articles.author: Andrew Hayward,Stephen Graves,Wendy Clack
articles.description: Dogecoin is a peer-to-peer cryptocurrency based on a popular Internet meme. The token started off as a joke, but it's become a serious proposition.
articles.title: What is Dogecoin?

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Bitcoin, Ethereum, and other digital assets aren't moving much today. But Dogecoin is after Musk tweeted about it.
articles.title: Dogecoin Surges 9% After Cryptic Elon Musk Tweets Link DOGE and X

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: KuCoin’s clarification follows a claim that its new KYC policy is cutting into its profits.
articles.title: KuCoin Denies Layoffs, Says Cuts Are Result of 'Biannual Appraisal'

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: The blockchain world of Aurory just got a little bigger. The studio behind two upcoming NFT games is going cross-chain to Arbitrum.
articles.title: Solana Gaming Franchise Aurory Expands to Ethereum Layer-2 Arbitrum

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: The Avalanche Foundation is looking to cash in on tokenization, launching a new $50 million initiative to bring activity to the network.
articles.title: Avalanche Foundation Launches $50M Asset Tokenization Initiative

articles.author: Pedro Solimano
articles.description: Alt season? Among the 25 largest exchanges, Bitcoin’s market dominance has dropped to levels not seen since April this year.
articles.title: Traders Are Turning From Bitcoin to Altcoins Amid Favorable Ripple Ruling

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: CEO of the dYdX Foundation Charles d'Haussey unpacks the decision behind moving one of the largest decentralized exchange protocol's over to its very own chain built on Cosmos. A key driver, he told Decrypt at this year's EthCC event, was that instead of launching on a rollup or another layer-1, launching a fully customized chain will allow dYdX to fine tune the network for its product's needs.
articles.title: 'Big Respect Between Ethereum and Cosmos Developer Communities': dYdX Foundation CEO

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: CyberKongz is moving its Play and Kollect NFT game from Polygon to Ronin, with plans for a second Ronin game in the works.
articles.title: CyberKongz to Mint Genkai NFTs on Ronin, Migrate Game to 'Axie' Chain

articles.author: Connor Sephton
articles.description: This isn't stopping Worldcoin from rolling out in Britain—with iris-scanning orbs now available in three locations throughout London.
articles.title: UK Privacy Regulator 'Making Enquiries' Into Sam Altman’s Worldcoin Amid Token Launch

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Binance, along with its CEO Changpeng Zhao, intends to request that the CFTC's latest complaint against the crypto exchange be dismissed.
articles.title: Binance Files Intent to Dismiss CFTC Complaint

articles.author: Nivesh Rustgi
articles.description: Azimut has already refused the demands from ransomware group BlackCats, who threatened to leak sensitive customer details online.
articles.title: $87B Italian Asset Manager Azimut Hit With Ransomware Attack

articles.author: Ryan Gladwin
articles.description: Founded by South Korean game studio 4:33 Creative Lab, Delabs is the team behind Rumble Racing Star and other upcoming titles.
articles.title: Delabs Games Raises $4.7 Million to Build on Polygon

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: The world's largest crypto exchange Binance by trading volume is set to make a return to Japan before the end of the summer.
articles.title: Binance Expected to Launch Crypto Services in Japan by August

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Marin Tvrdić, a business development contributor to the Lido DAO, sat down with Decrypt during this year's EthCC to break down how the liquid staking protocol has managed such a massive lead, how it plans to keep that lead, and the protocol's new dual-governance tokenomics.
articles.title: Ethereum Staking Solution Lido 'Had Perfect Product Market Fit' at Launch, Says DAO's Biz Dev Contributor

articles.author: Mattis Meichler
articles.description: Along with fresh funding, Atlantis has also secured a key piece of registration in France and the launch of a new product.
articles.title: DeFi Project Atlendis Lands $1M Loan From French National Bank BPI

articles.author: Ryan Gladwin
articles.description: REVIEW: Ev.io is a free-to-play, web-based game that recalls arena shooter classics like Quake, but with a play-to-earn twist via Solana.
articles.title: Frenetic Shooter 'Ev.io' Lets You Earn Solana While Fragging Enemies

articles.author: Nicholas Morgan
articles.description: Russia’s central bank will begin tests for the digital ruble starting on August 1 after receiving Putin’s blessing.
articles.title: Putin Signs Digital Ruble Bill Into Law, Priming Russian CBDC for Launch

articles.description: Ev.io is a web-based first-person shooter that's free to play, but lets NFT holders earn in-game currency that can be redeemed for Solana (SOL). Decrypt contributor Ryan Gladwin shares his review of the fun throwback to Quake-style blasting, albeit with a modern crypto twist.
articles.title: 'Ev.io' Game Review: Earn Solana While Blasting Enemies

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: A digital assets product manager said the agreement was “easy money” for market makers.
articles.title: Worldcoin Launch Supply Mostly Made of Market Maker Loans

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: The CIO of Main Street Research says both retailers and institutions are on a market spree—but the intoxicating effects of the AI drug may fade.
articles.title: FOMO-Fueled AI Market Bull Run is Unsustainable, Analyst Says

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Bitcoin miners and enthusiasts celebrate another milestone for the network—the 800,000th block mined—as it approaches another halving event.
articles.title: Bitcoin Halving Is Less Than 40,000 Blocks Away—Here's What That Means

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Dashing the hopes of educators, OpenAI decommissions its AI Classifier due to poor accuracy.
articles.title: OpenAI Quietly Shuts Down Its AI Detection Tool

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: But the outflows are minor and don’t necessarily mean investors are less interested, CoinShares told Decrypt.
articles.title: Investors Change Course and Pull Money Out of Bitcoin Funds—But Likely Remain Bullish

articles.author: Pedro Solimano
articles.description: There are five members of the animal kingdom represented by tokens on Coingecko: Hamsters, snails, rabbits, horses, and rats. And, confusingly: Marbles.
articles.title: Bored of Hamsters Already? Degens Are Now Betting Crypto on Snails, Rats and Rabbits

articles.author: Ryan Gladwin
articles.description: Deadrop has a sharp skill curve, but GG has hard-won tips to help accelerate your journey to the top in this vertical extraction shooter.
articles.title: 'Deadrop' Beginner's Guide: How to Dominate in Dr. Disrespect's Shooter

articles.author: Alyssa Hertig
articles.description: Artists and hobbyists have found physical ways to pay tribute to Bitcoin's ones and zeros. Here's a look at some of the biggest monuments.
articles.title: Bitcoin IRL: Here Are All the Real-Life Tributes to Satoshi Nakamoto's Invention

articles.author: Decrypt Staff
articles.description: Bitcoin exchange-traded funds have sprung up around the world—but the U.S. SEC has made slow progress towards approval of a Bitcoin spot ETF.
articles.title: These Are the High-Profile Spot Bitcoin ETF Applications Currently in Play

articles.author: Connor Sephton
articles.description: SBF's lawyers complained that newly-appointed FTX CEO, John J. Ray III, has been "routinely and gratuitously attacking" his predecessor.
articles.title: Sam Bankman-Fried Might Have Leaked Caroline's Diary, But Lawyers Say 'He's Done Nothing Wrong'

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Account abstraction this, smart wallets that. Discussions at EthCC Paris about improving user experience have pointed at industry leader MetaMask as an example of what not to do. But that may soon change, with a host of updates and optimizations coming to crypto's number one wallet, said its product lead Alex Jupiter. It still may take some time, though, before these changes take effect.
articles.title: 'Moving Fast and Breaking Things Isn't the Web3 Ethos': MetaMask Product Lead

articles.author: Alys Key
articles.description: Open-source code, in-app payments, and a new logo? Here's what Tesla CEO Elon Musk plans for Twitter post-takeover.
articles.title: Twitter's 'X' Rebrand: All the Things Elon Musk Has Planned for the 'Everything App'

articles.author: Connor Sephton
articles.description: Worldcoin has finally launched, but Vitalik Buterin doesn't think everyone will be able to get a World ID—and if they do, they might be misused.
articles.title: Worldcoin Has 'Major Issues' and Will Take Years to Work, Vitalik Buterin Warns

articles.author: Nivesh Rustgi
articles.description: With markets anticipating yet another rate hike this week from the Federal Reserve, Bitcoin fell back below $30,000
articles.title: Bitcoin Hits Monthly Low Amid Uncertainty Ahead of Fed Meeting

articles.author: Nivesh Rustgi
articles.description: Binance, Bybit, Huobi, OKX, and Gate crypto exchanges were all quick to announce that they would list the new WorldCoin token WLD.
articles.title: Crypto Exchanges Line Up to List Worldcoin’s Newly Launched WLD Token

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Argent co-founder Julien Niset told Decrypt at EthCC Paris that he wants to make crypto wallets disappear. Or at least how they're currently conceived. From clunky seed phrases to a stiff user experience, Argent hopes to make using crypto a little less intimidating and a whole lot more fun.
articles.title: Scaling Smart Wallets on Starknet 'Was The Winning Combination', Says Argent Co-Founder

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Described as “a massive leap for the entire project,” the Worldcoin milestone comes with World ID expansion and global Orb deployment plans.
articles.title: Sam Altman's Worldcoin Protocol Launches WLD Token on Optimism Mainnet

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: The 'Torres Doctrine' is the law for at least two years, Crypto Law founder John Deaton writes.
articles.title: SEC Appeal Not a ‘Setback’ for Ripple XRP Ruling, Crypto Lawyer Says

articles.author: Jose Antonio Lanz
articles.description: A group of researchers discovered six chemical compounds that could reverse aging, not just slow it.
articles.title: Scientists Discover 'Chemical Cocktails' That Reverse Aging

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: Also, a pair of crypto law experts tweeted their disappointment over recent crypto policy moves in Washington.
articles.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: Xi Jinping NFT Delisted from OpenSea

articles.description: Mighty Action Heroes is the flagship blockchain title from Mighty Bear Games. But is the browser-based battle royale shooter worth checking out? Decrypt's Kate Irwin offers her thoughts and a first look at the upcoming game.
articles.title: Inside Mighty Action Heroes' Open Beta

articles.description: Decrypt's Kate Irwin playtests Dr. Disrespect and Midnight Society's first-person shooter Deadrop and shares the latest game updates, as well as her opinions on the game in development. Currently, Deadrop offers Polygon Founders Pass NFTs with no other crypto plans revealed just yet.
articles.title: Dr. Disrespect's 'Deadrop': Early Access Gameplay From Snapshot VI

articles.description: In the wake of EA Sports and Fortnite creator Epic Games embracing Nike's NFT platform, Mythical Games CEO John Linden tells Decrypt's Andrew Hayward how quickly he expects to see more major traditional game publishers enter the blockchain space and how quickly the industry will scale.
articles.title: 'More and More' Game Publishers Will Embrace NFTs: Mythical Games CEO

articles.description: Decrypt's Kate Irwin plays Gran Saga: Unlimited's second community playtest, reports her findings, and offers her opinion and insights on the upcoming game, which will offer optional Aptos NFTs.
articles.title: Gran Saga Unlimited Early Access: Inside the Anime MMORPG on Aptos

articles.description: 100 Thieves content creator and gamer Moe also goes by "Yassuo" online after his favorite League of Legends character. Decrypt's Kate Irwin asks him about 100 Thieves' future crypto plans and whether Moe thinks creators like xQc and Pokimane might ever come around to blockchain games.
articles.title: 100 Thieves' Moe Says Blockchain Games Will 'Eventually' Be Accepted by Livestreamers

articles.description: Splinterlands Cofounder Matt Rosen tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about how the game has evolved over its five-year history and why he doesn't listen to the FUD around crypto.
articles.title: "Games of the Future Are Going to Be Different," Says Splinterlands Cofounder

articles.description: Plai Labs Marketing Director Payton Kaleiwahea tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about player response to the combat game Champions Ascension in development, which offers arena combat, raid bosses, AI landscape features, and more.
articles.title: Inside Champions Ascension: Like 'For Honor' with NFTs?

articles.description: Former Activision Vice President Michael Lee is now the SVP of Growth at Matter Labs. At the 3XP gaming conference, Lee sat down with Decrypt's Kate Irwin to discuss crypto gaming and give his predictions for the industry.
articles.title: Ex-Activision VP Michael Lee: Gaming Is Crypto's 'Killer App'

articles.description: Decrypt's Kate Irwin goes to Burbank, California for a behind-the-scenes tour of AMGI Studios, the developers of upcoming game My Pet Hooligan.
articles.title: Behind the Scenes with AMGI Studios and My Pet Hooligan

articles.description: Legend of Arcadia Executive Producer Andy Lee tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about the game and why they switched from EVM to new protocol Sui.
articles.title: Why Legend of Arcadia Chose Sui Over EVM Chains

articles.description: Decrypt's Kate Irwin shares a first look at Delabs' upcoming lawn mower racing game Rumble Racing Star, which offers a large cast of quirky characters pulled from the worlds of Bored Ape Yacht Club, Pudgy Penguins, and more.
articles.title: Rumble Racing Star Game Preview: Is This Mario Kart With NFTs?

articles.description: Decrypt's Kate Irwin chats with Laguna Games about why the team chose to move away from an offer with WB Games to develop a Game of Thrones licensed title—and made Crypto Unicorns instead.
articles.title: Why Laguna Games Turned Down 'Game of Thrones' for Crypto Unicorns

articles.description: Mythical Games just raised a $37 million Series C1 round on the back of the early success of NFL Rivals, which has already topped a million downloads in two months. Mythical CEO John Linden joins Decrypt's Andrew Hayward to discuss the launch and impact of NFL Rivals.
articles.title: Mythical Games CEO John Linden on NFL Rivals Topping 1M Downloads

articles.description: At 3XP, Ava Labs Head of Gaming Ed Chang sat down with Decrypt's Kate Irwin to discuss some of the biggest Avalanche-based games on the horizon and how the company is approaching and thinking about Web3 gaming.
articles.title: How Ava Labs Is Approaching Gaming on Avalanche
